content:
Hey guys! I am a 30ish computer programmer from Brazil who just recently (finally \o/) got the chance to properly leverage Rust and all its speed and fearless concurrency in a project :happy: I use rust-analyzer daily and I found a simple formatting bug, I just forked the repo and I'm going to try to fix it and contribute back. I figured I should get in touch with the community as well. Maybe there's more stuff I can do to contribute?

I also like making music in my spare time with trackers (Renoise) and also Puredata. If you're into music stuff, hit me too :P
Hi! I think I left some pointers on your issue. There's also the t-compiler/wg-rls-2.0 stream, specifically for rust-analyzer.

Laurențiu Nicola said:

Hi! I think I left some pointers on your issue. There's also the t-compiler/wg-rls-2.0 stream, specifically for rust-analyzer.

Thank you :bow:
if you need an issue to work on, you can leave me a message :slight_smile:
